Seeing a woman weighing less than 200 pounds was bizarre and unsettling to the inhabitants. But that was rare to witness and currently nonexistent at the mall as carefree girls heaved their obese bodies about in search of nourishment.

Clover thanked Shirley and then asked "I don't want to come off as rude Ms. Rogers...I mean Shirley but did the antidote not work for you?"

Shirley chuckled and said "Oh no it worked for me I was back to old skinny bitchy self in no time. The problem was my husband and I hated it. I was happy to drop all that weight at first but pretty soon I realized that I missed my curves and maintaining that scrawny little figure was so much work. The constant dieting, the working out, all the damn running I'd totally lost the will for it. Pretty soon I also realized I was happier and more fun to be around when I was big all the excess dieting and exercise made me act like such a bitch."

Shirley then lowered her voice a bit and said "And don't tell my hubby I told you this but when I was big it didn't take long for us to realize what a closet chubby chaser he was. After I got skinny again our sex life was awful the poor thing just couldn't go back to making love to a bag of bones after experiencing the intimacy of a Big Beautiful Woman." Shirley said with a chuckle.

Clover's eyes went wide as her story made so much sense to her. Clover was now eager to find out how she had regained so much weight so quickly?

Clover smiled and said "I totally understand Shirley this won't go into my report but just between us ladies how did you get your curves back?"

Shirley then explained that she'd tried to gain the weight back herself. She got into cooking, she took cardio out of her workouts, she was eating meal replacement bars all the time but it was painfully show going. After months of effort she was hardly even thick let alone a BBW again. Then she'd begun to poke around online and she discovered that lots of people were going through what she had and wanted to regain their passion patties physique. She'd read numerous people online talking about trying and failing to regain weight and then out of nowhere a mystery product hit the market.

For a hefty sum you could buy these liquid droplets to put on your food. Shirley didn't know what the liquid was but it had worked like magic. All it had taken was one vial and in just 6 months or so she'd gone from thick to her current size.

Clover's mind was now racing she had to get that chemical it was the answer to her dreams soon she could become a BBW again.

133.content:
It was another warm day in LA and Sam of the Beverly Hill's Totally Spies was in her apartment, lounging on the couch and watching some daytime drama while she snacked on potato chips.

The brainy spy's slothful actions weren't voluntary however, but a part of a special mission.

Jerry had informed her, Alex, and Clover that some strange white vans had been going all over the nation, kidnapping larger women.

The spies' mission was to figure out who they were and what they were up to. So far, whenever they tried to tail a one of the vans, they literally disapeared somehow.

Apparently, the only way they could catch them would be if one of them became a bigger woman. They drew straws to find out who would fatten up, and Sam drew the longest straw.

So after two months of intensive snacking, gorging, and forced naps, Sam had grown to a whopping 194 lbs.

She had a spare tire gut and chubby cheeks. Her breasts and but had grown, but only in proportion to the rest of her body, making her look like a big, pudgier version of herself.

Finally, while she reached a meaty hand into the nearly empty bag of chips, her doorbell rang.

Getting ready in case it was the kidnappers, Sam waddled to the door, when she opened it was...
133.title: Pudgy: Sam's big mission

choices: the other kindnapped women, including Clover and Alex, but they weren't the same
the villain behind the kidnappings, the ridiculously obese queen of the island
a room full of strange and exotic foods, plus a tv and a bed
1331.content:
Two muscled men who were dressed in black delivery boy costumes and had a huge box behind them. These disguises didn't attract suspicion from neighbors. One thing that did give them away were the strange guns they had pointed at Sam. Sam wasn't worried though, she planned with Clover and Alex and had been waiting for this. If all goes according to plan Clover and Alex should spring out from their hiding places and they would all take them out, yet Clover and Alex didn't pop out.

The men zapped with their ray guns. The guns were designed to knock people without doing any real harm. They picked up Sam and put her inside the box. No one in the neighborhood could see what had happen and Clover and Alex were missing in action, no one could help Sam now.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------
Later Sam woke up in the box. There was no light so she couldn't see a thing. "What's going on? Where am I? Wait I remember! The kidnappers got me, but Clover and Alex should have been ready to help me. They'd better have a good excuse for letting me get kidnapped." thought Sam as she struggled inside the box.

Then suddenly the box was opened and Sam was pulled out by the same men who kidnapped her. They were the same men, but they weren't in the same costumes. They were dressed up like jungle men now, with loincloths and strange necklaces made from exotic beads. Then Sam notices her surroundings. She was now on some tropical island, a very strange tropical island. On the island all the men were muscular, which of course included great strength. Even if Clover and Alex were with her they would have trouble fighting these islanders. The women on the other hand were all obese, each about 500 pounds or more. All the women were also in very revealing jungle clothes, but seemed to be more dominant than the males of the island. Most of the males were feeding the women, some were doing chores for the women, and some were bowing down to the women. "Okay this mission is getting weird. Why are the men so fit and the women... not so fit? Wait a minute, all the women kidnapped were over weight. The island must like fat women, but why? Maybe the guys on this island are all fat admirers and think big women are sexy, as weird as that sounds. Then again, from the looks of it the women are in command, so does that mean the women of the island are behind this? Maybe when I find all the other kidnapped women I'll find out whats going on here. Then I can call Jerry, Alex, or Clover...Hey! Whatever happened to Clover and Alex? WHOOP gave us a brilliant plan to catch them. It couldn't have gone wrong... unless they knew about it somehow and got to Clover and Alex first!" thought Sam right before the men picked up Sam.

The kidnappers took her to...
1331.title: Sam's  unexpected trip

135.content:
It was a typical summer day in Beverly Hills, and the spies were spending some time apart having the day to themselves.
Clover was out clothes shopping, Alex was out looking for soccer dvd's and Sam was at the library studying. Several hours pass and Sam
begins to make her way home so she decides to stop by the mall and explore.

Sam: Hmm... Where should I go today??....
** She was hesitant from spending any money as it would distract her from her studying**
Oh look! a new bakery has opened... I am a bit hungry I haven't eaten for a couple hours.. let's see what this place is like.

Sam wonders in and looks around, the store was covered in all kinds of decorations, she walks up to the counter where a rather large female employee was standing.
Sam: Hi there! How long have you guys been here?
Lady: Oh just a few weeks, we are getting some loyal customers though they just love our cookies.
Sam: Thats good to hear! *Sniff* Oh what smells so good?
Lady: Those are the cookies just in the oven, hey wanna come back and see how they're made?
Sam: ugh okay sure?
The young employee opens up the counter and lets Sam through they walk into the next room with the oven.
Lady: My name is Jess by the way nice to meet you.
Sam: Hey I'm Sam.
Jess: I think i've seen you at college? I just recently dropped out to work here full time.
Sam: Oh? Why is that? do they pay good money here? Maybe I should apply for some casual work!
???: Oh but you already have....
Sam: Huh?
???: Now Jess Lock her in!
Sam: Hey What the!? Let me out!? Who are you?!
???: It is I you ignorant twerp! Doctor Bittersweet! I have spent the last 3 years planning for this very moment, Jess hold her tightly!
Sam: But How!? You were in prison!!! How did you escape?!
Inga: I don't have time to answer your questions to give you time to escape! Now Sam, do you remember what you did to me the last time we met?
Sam: we Stopped you from making the whole world obese!! Thats what you get for making Clover and Jerry so fat! It's called Karma!
Inga: Shut up! I have waited so long for this moment! You want karma, well here Drink it! It is the formula you forced down my throat all those years ago only this time i added an extra kick! Hahahaha.
Sam: Nooo!!! Please dont!...

Inga jams the liquid tube down Sams throat and with Inga's obese employee holding her down, Sam couldn't escape.
The formula flows down her mouth clutching on to her taste buds and spreaded throughout her body.
Within seconds her body began to go numb, her boy shorts strained as blubber tore through, her butt swelled like 2 balloons as did her breasts, her flat toned stomach exploded out into rolls of fat shredding her top and bursting off all of her buttons. Her face and neck disappeared behind new layers of fat hiding her once defining facial features and her arms jiggled around uncontrollably. There she stood at over 300 pounds in what was left of her clothes, Bittersweet had watched her revenge unfold before her very eyes... at least with Sam.

Inga: Sam, how do you feel?
135.title: Sweet Revenge
